channel.title: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood delayed
channel.description: I know its old news, but is anyone else ticked off that the PC version of Assassin's Creed Brotherhood is delayed till February when the console versions are coming out in less than a month? This is the game I've been looking forward to for the better part of 2 years.

item.title: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood delayed
item.dc:creator: DethklokSoldier
item.description:
When I saw the title I thought that it was delayed everywhere, and I got really annoyed. Then I read the post.You should probably get someone to change the title to Asassin’s Creed Brotherhood PC delayed, or PC Assassin’s Creed Brotherhood delayed.

Read full topic

item.title: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood delayed
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
It strikes me as one of those games one would rather sit down and enjoy on a console rather than a game one would hunch over a keyboard for.

It’s just hooded guys with tiny knives. You can probably wait.

Read full topic

item.title: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood delayed
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I pre-ordered Limited for 360. I’m not too worried about the PC release since it will undoubtedly have the crappy DRM which AC2 is infamous for.

Read full topic
